mapper.select:
select
from tb_staff
AND delete_flag = 0
AND staff_id like '%${staffId}%'
AND name like '%${name}%'
AND department like '%${department}%'
AND position like '%${position}%'
AND entry_date like '%${entryDate}%'
AND is_formal like '%${isFormal}%'
AND formal_date like '%${formalDate}%'
AND company_age like '%${companyAge}%'
AND id_number like '%${idNumber}%'
AND birth like '%${birth}%'
AND age like '%${age}%'
AND gender like '%${gender}%'
AND pre_seniority like '%${preSeniority}%'
AND seniority like '%${seniority,jdbcType=REAL}%'
AND pay_card like '%${payCard}%'
AND political_status like '%${politicalStatus}%'
AND job_number like '%${jobNumber}%'
AND contract_start like '%${contractStart}%'
AND contract_end like '%${contractEnd}%'
AND tel like '%${tel}%'
AND graduate_school like '%${graduateSchool}%'
AND major like '%${major}%'
AND education like '%${education}%'
AND graduate_date like '%${graduateDate}%'
AND professional_level like '%${professionalLevel}%'
AND professional_name like '%${professionalName}%'
AND certificate_validity like '%${certificateValidity}%'

AND census_register like '%${censusRegister}%'
